column1: The Lexington Traffic Management Center will be closed on Monday January 20 in observance of Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. Day.
Regular traffic reports will resume Tuesday January 21 at 6:30 a.m.

column3: Street Closures Scheduled for the Martin Luther King, Jr. Freedom March:
column4: Monday January 20 from 10 a.m. to 11 a.m. in downtown Lexington.

column3: Street Closures Scheduled for the Martin Luther King, Jr. Freedom March:
column4: Rolling street closures starting at Heritage Hall with the following route:

column3: Street Closures Scheduled for the Martin Luther King, Jr. Freedom March:
column4: The march will proceed on Vine St to Rose St, then left on Rose St to Main St, and proceed on Main St back to Heritage Hall.
